name: Kill yourself - Brackeys Rewind Jam 2020.2
description:
Your only objective it to kill yourself. After you die, you'll respawn, nothing is different. Well, except for the fact the ghost of your past self is running around. You better stop it from killing itself the only way you know how. By killing it first. Now you're alone. Kill yourself again.

CONTROLS:

A D - move left and right

Space - Jump

Left click - Shoot
